errors.IMAGE_NOT_FOUND: Image not found or already associated with another question
errors.ALREADY_AT_TOP: This question is already at the top
errors.ALREADY_AT_BOTTOM: This question is already at the bottom
errors.USER_RESPONSE_NOT_ALLOWED: User is not allowed to respond to the survey
errors.RESPONSE_LIMIT_EXCEEDED: 'closeOnResponseLimit' is enabled but 'limit' is not set or invalid in group '.
errors.SURVEY_NOT_YET_RELEASED: Survey is scheduled to release on {{date}} and cannot be accessed yet in group '.
errors.RELEASE_ON_DATE_WITHOUT_DATE: 'releaseOnDate' is enabled but no 'date' is specified in group '.
errors.SURVEY_CLOSED: Survey was closed on {{date}} and is no longer accessible in group '.
errors.CLOSE_ON_DATE_WITHOUT_DATE: 'closeOnDate' is enabled but no 'date' is specified in group '.
errors.QUESTION_REQUIRES_SELECTION: Question requires at least one selection.
errors.INVALID_RATING_VALUE: Question has an invalid rating value.
errors.SURVEY_NOT_FOUND_FOR_THIS_BUSINESS: Survey not found for this business
errors.ANSWER_OPTIONS_MUST_BE_GREATER_THAN_TWO: Answer options must be greater than 2
errors.MAX_SELECTIONS_EXCEEDED: Question ID {{questionId}} allows a maximum of {{maxSelections}} selections.
errors.FORM_ALREADY_COMPLETED: You have already completed the form
